author: joed
msg: Fixed wsdl loading by resorting to a bundle.getEntry and passing that along.
That avoids CXF common trying to use classloading magick to resolve the resources.

author: marvin
msg: Fix a test that runs scripts by hard-coding every dir in @INC into the scripts
using 'use lib' directives.  The scripts were failing when a dependency could
only be found in a directory specified by PERL5LIB.
